title: Cable television service fraud in the first degree
context: [PART XII. CABLE TELEVISION AND TELECOMMUNICATION SERVICE OFFENSES] ยง708-8200 Cable television service fraud in the first degree. (1) A person commits cable television service fraud in the first degree if the person knowingly: (a) Distributes written instructions or plans to make or assemble a cable television service device and knows that the written plans or instructions are intended to be used to make or assemble a device to obtain cable television service without payment of applicable charges; or (b) Distributes a cable television service device and knows that the device is intended to be used to obtain cable television service without payment of applicable charges. (2) Cable television service fraud in the first degree is a class C felony. [L 1987, c 268, pt of ยง2; am L 1988, c 300, ยง1; am L 1989, c 261, ยง19]
